sen.j: 亀岡祭（かめおかまつり）は、京都府亀岡市で毎年10月23日から10月25日までの3日間行われる祭で鍬山神社の例祭である。
sen.e: Kameoka Matsuri Festival is a reisai (regular festival) of Kuwayama-jinja Shrine that takes place for three days from October 23 to October 25 annually in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kameoka Matsuri Festival is a reisai (regular festival) of Kuwayama-jinja Shrine that takes place for three days from October 23 to October 25 annually in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kameoka Matsuri Festival is a reisai (regular festival) of Kuwayama-jinja Shrine that takes place for three days from October 23 to October 25 annually in Kameoka City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: また、「丹波の祇園祭」、「亀岡の秋祭り」などともいわれている。
sen.e: The festival is also called such as "Gion matsuri Festival of Tanba" and "Autumn matsuri Festival of Kameoka".
The festival is also called the "Gion matsuri Festival of Tanba" and the "Autumn matsuri Festival of Kameoka."
The festival is also called the "Gion matsuri Festival of Tanba" and the "Autumn matsuri Festival of Kameoka."

sen.j: 10月23日（宵々宮） 三輪山の夜間巡行
sen.e: October 23 (two days before a festival vigil): Night parade of Mt. Miwa.
October 23 (two days before a festival vigil): Night parade of Mt. Miwa.
October 23 (two days before a festival vigil): Night parade of Mt. Miwa.

sen.j: 10月24日（宵宮） スタンプラリー
sen.e: October 24 (eve of a festival vigil): Stamp rally
October 24 (eve of a festival vigil): Stamp rally
October 24 (eve of a festival vigil): Stamp rally
October 25 (main festival): Yamahoko (decorated floats) Junko parade
sen.cmt: 山鉾の補足をしました
